column1: Smoque BBQ////Simply delicious!  The sliced brisket is so tender utensils are useless.  My own mother said it was worth the trip to Chicago just for Smoque
column2: and I haven't seen her in 3 months.   Everything was so good!  Mac n Cheese
column4: peach cobbler and cornbread.  There were three of us
column5: so we all sampled from one another.  I seriously can't wait to go back!
